name: Mj√∂lnir
description: The hammer of Thor, the Norse god of thunder. It is capable of leveling mountains and always returns to its owner's hand.
originStory: Forged by the dwarf brothers Sindri and Brokkr as part of a wager with Loki.

name: Aegis
description: A shield carried by Athena and Zeus, often bearing the head of a Gorgon. It inspires terror in enemies and protects the wielder.
originStory: Forged by Hephaestus, often depicted as a goatskin shield adorned with the head of Medusa.

name: Ruyi Jingu Bang
description: The magical golden-hooped staff of Sun Wukong. It can change size at will, from a pillar holding up the ocean to a needle behind the ear.
originStory: Originally a pillar used by Yu the Great to measure the depth of the ocean floodwaters.

name: Ame-no-Nuboko
description: The Heavenly Jeweled Spear used by Izanagi and Izanami to churn the sea and create the first land.
originStory: Given to the primal couple by the older heavenly gods to bring order to the chaos below.
